TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AsnEncodedData extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示抽象语法表示法一 (ASN.1) 编码的数据。

span.span: Represents Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象语法表示法一 (ASN.1)，其定义中 CCITT 建议 X.208，是一种方法指定将按顺序传输的抽象对象。Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1), which is defined in CCITT Recommendation X.208, is a way to specify abstract objects that will be serially transmitted. 一套用于表示为 1 和 0 组成的字符串的此类对象的 ASN.1 规则称为可分辨编码规则 (DER)，并部分 8.7 CCITT 建议书 X.509 中定义。The set of ASN.1 rules for representing such objects as strings of ones and zeros is called the Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER), and is defined in CCITT Recommendation X.509, Section 8.7. 当前由.NET Framework 中的加密命名空间使用这些编码的方法。These encoding methods are currently used by the cryptography namespace in the .NET Framework. 请注意，是否访问此类的实例时遇到未知的数据类型，则数据作为十六进制字符串返回。Note that if an unknown data type is encountered while accessing an instance of this class, data is returned as a hexadecimal string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CPP/asnencodeddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CS/asnencodeddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/VB/asnencodeddata.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 编码数据的格式化版本作为字符串返回。

span.span: Returns a formatted version of the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data as a string.

returns.span: 一个表示 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 编码数据的格式化字符串。

span.span: A formatted string that represents the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你需要打印抽象语法表示法一个 ASN.1 编码数据或将信息输出到文本框中，请使用此方法。Use this method if you need to print Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data or output the information to a text box. 使用`multiLine`参数控制的输出的布局。Use the `multiLine` parameter to control the layout of the output. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class.
